definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: Disregard for human life and numbness, is not only the fickleness of the world.
sentences.chinese: 对生命的漠视和麻木，岂止是世态炎凉。

definition: the ways of the world/social behavior
affairs of life/things of the world
worldly affairs/the ways of the world
the men of today are sadly degenerated (idiom)
lit. when people leave, the tea cools (idiom)/fig. when sb is no longer in a position of power, others cease to care about him
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
the ways of the world/the morals of the time
worldly wisdom/the ways of the world/to know how to get on in the world
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
the world/this world/the world of the living
